description: Square array read by antidiagonals alternately upwards and downwards. A(i, j) is the least positive integer not occurring earlier in the sequence such that (1) if j > 1, then the j-th partial sum of the i-th row is prime; and (2) if i > 1, then the i-th partial sum of the j-th column is composite (with A(1,1) = 1).
